autofocus.title: Autofocus
autofocus.description: Specifies that a button should automatically get focus when the page loads

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: Specifies that a button should be disabled

formaction.title: Form action
formaction.description: Specifies where to send the form-data when a form is submitted. Only for type="submit"

formenctype.title: Form encoding type
formenctype.description: Specifies how form-data should be encoded before sending it to a server. Only for type="submit"

formmethod.title: Method
formmethod.description: Specifies how to send the form-data (which HTTP method to use). Only for type="submit"

formnovalidate.title: Form no validate
formnovalidate.description: Specifies that the form-data should not be validated on submission. Only for type="submit"

formtarget.title: Form target
formtarget.description: Specifies where to display the response after submitting the form. Only for type="submit"

name.title: Name
name.description: Specifies a name for the button

type.title: Type
type.description: Specifies a type for the button

value.title: Value
value.description: Specifies an initial value for the button
